Unit type using the UnitType interface generated by the UnitGenerator.

changeDescriptionLabel(String, String) - Static method in class gameplay.GameMain
Is a static method which sets the description used in the sidebar.
checkForEliminationVictory() - Method in class gameplay.logic.GameLogic
Checks if either player or opponent has been eliminated Returns 1 if user loses, 0 if opponent loses, else it returns -1
checkForLegalAttack(int, int, ArrayList<Tile>) - Method in class gameplay.logic.GameLogic
Checks to see if attack is legal by checking if the attack position player wants to attack is one of the tiles returns in getAttackableTiles() method.
checkForLegalMove(int, int, ArrayList<Tile>) - Method in class gameplay.logic.GameLogic
Checks to see if move is legal by checking if the move position player wants to move is one of the tiles returns in getMovementPossibleTiles() method.
checkForSurrender() - Method in class database.Database
Checks if a game has been surrendered.
checkIfOpponentReady() - Method in class database.Database
Checks if your opponent is ready during the placement phase of the game.
Cleaner - Class in database
A simple class that cleans up after SQL statements.
Cleaner() - Constructor for class database.Cleaner
 
close() - Method in class database.Database
Calls the shutdown method from ConnectionPool.java
closeAndLogout() - Static method in class menus.Main
Closes all connections and logs out the users from the database on program exit.
closeConnection(Connection) - Static method in class database.Cleaner
Closes Connection, usually this method is called upon in a finally block
closeResSet(ResultSet) - Static method in class database.Cleaner
Closes ResultSets, usually this method is called upon in a finally block
closeStatement(Statement) - Static method in class database.Cleaner

Config - Class in database
Configuration file that contains information needed to connect to the MYSQL database Configuration is set up on program launch
ConnectionPool - Class in database
A simple connection pool that is made to be initialized at the start of the program to minimize resource usage during the programs run-time.
create() - Static method in class database.ConnectionPool
Initializes the connection pool.
createGame(int, String) - Method in class database.Database
Creates a game.
createObstacles() - Method in class gameplay.logic.GameLogic
Creates Obstacles to be placed within the middle region of the grid.
